text: Margot Drake (1899–1948) was an English stage and film actress. During the silent era she appeared in eight British films including The Wonderful Year.Low p.484 ==Selected filmography== * A Bachelor Husband (1920) * The Breed of the Treshams (1920) * The Headmaster (1921) * The Wonderful Year (1921) * The Street of Adventure (1921) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. History of the British Film, 1918-1929. George Allen & Unwin, 1971. ==External links== * Category:1899 births Category:1948 deaths Category:English film actresses Category:English silent film actresses Category:20th-century English actresses Category:Actresses from London
title: Margot Drake
